attributes.action: Sir Alex Ferguson as the next England Manager with David Beckham as assistant.
attributes.additional_details: Sir Alex Ferguson is a winner, well known for his no nonsense approach to the prima donna's of the modern game. He has a track record of success, winning every domestic honour as well as the Champions League. With an England legend such as David Beckham as his assistant, we will have the recipe for success that has been lacking for so long.
attributes.background: On the basis that the English FA is clueless, this decision needs to be taken out of their hands and the government needs to step in and steady the ship. Brexit was not to be taken literally by the England football team and the FA.
